20101227220547.000|20101227220549.000|TR0|DAN RIVERS, CNN CORRESPONDENT:  The nine 
20101227220549.000|20101227220551.000|TR0|men all appeared here at Westminster 
20101227220551.000|20101227220554.000|TR0|Magistrate Court here.  Charges against 
20101227220554.000|20101227220556.000|TR0|them, all of them charged with conspiracy 
20101227220556.000|20101227220559.000|TR0|to cause an explosion between the sixth of 
20101227220559.000|20101227220601.000|TR0|November and the 21st of December.  And 
20101227220601.000|20101227220604.000|TR0|the prosecutors told the court that the 
20101227220604.000|20101227220606.000|TR0|list of targets included the U.S. Embassy 
20101227220606.000|20101227220609.000|TR0|in London and the London Stock Exchange.  
20101227220609.000|20101227220611.000|TR0|All of them also charged for preparing for 
20101227220611.000|20101227220613.000|TR0|an act of terrorism in the same date and 
20101227220613.000|20101227220616.000|TR0|(inaudible) that involve downloading, 
20101227220616.000|20101227220618.000|TR0|researching, obtaining, and discussing 
20101227220618.000|20101227220621.000|TR0|materials and methods, researching, 
20101227220621.000|20101227220623.000|TR0|discussing, and carrying out 
20101227220623.000|20101227220626.000|TR0|reconnaissance on agreeing on potential

20101227220628.000|20101227220631.000|TR0|meetings and interestingly, igniting and 
20101227220631.000|20101227220633.000|TR0|testing insengery (ph) material.
20101227220633.000|20101227220635.000|TR0|
20101227220635.000|20101227220638.000|TR0|None of the men were granted by all three 
20101227220638.000|20101227220640.000|TR0|of them Cardiff, four from Stoke-on-Trent 
20101227220640.000|20101227220643.000|TR0|and two from London.  They've all been 
20101227220643.000|20101227220645.000|TR0|remanded in custody.  So, they'll now 
20101227220645.000|20101227220648.000|TR0|appear at the Central Criminal Court, the 
20101227220648.000|20101227220650.000|TR0|Old Bailey, on the 14th of January.  This, 
20101227220650.000|20101227220653.000|TR0|of course, all relates to dawn raids 
20101227220653.000|20101227220655.000|TR0|across the country in three different 
20101227220655.000|20101227220657.000|TR0|locations on the 20th of December, just 
20101227220657.000|20101227220700.000|TR0|five days before Christmas carried out by 
20101227220700.000|20101227220702.000|TR0|three different police forces.
20101227220702.000|20101227220705.000|TR0|
20101227220705.000|20101227220707.000|TR0|Twelve men were arrested in those raids,

20101227220724.000|20101227220727.000|TR0|MALVEAUX:  Thank you, Dan.  We're also

20101227220734.000|20101227220737.000|TR0|almost 50 people on Saturday wounded more 
20101227220737.000|20101227220739.000|TR0|than 100 was a teenage girl.  Our CNN's 
20101227220739.000|20101227220742.000|TR0|Chris Lawrence is in Islamabad, Pakistan.  
20101227220742.000|20101227220744.000|TR0|And, Chris, tell us about this.  It is 
20101227220744.000|20101227220746.000|TR0|very rare to have a female suicide bomber.

20101227220751.000|20101227220754.000|TR0|CHRIS LAWRENCE, CNN PENTAGON 
20101227220754.000|20101227220756.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  Yes.  Exactly, Suzanne. 
20101227220756.000|20101227220759.000|TR0|This is extremely rare in Pakistan, maybe 
20101227220759.000|20101227220801.000|TR0|only one other known instance of a female 
20101227220801.000|20101227220804.000|TR0|suicide bomber taking action like this.  
20101227220804.000|20101227220806.000|TR0|But Pakistani government officials are now 
20101227220806.000|20101227220808.000|TR0|confirming to us they do believe it was a 
20101227220808.000|20101227220811.000|TR0|young girl.  They're saying that because 
20101227220811.000|20101227220813.000|TR0|of one -- because of eyewitness accounts.  
20101227220813.000|20101227220816.000|TR0|People who were there at this food 
20101227220816.000|20101227220818.000|TR0|distribution point, and, two, because of 
20101227220818.000|20101227220821.000|TR0|some of the body parts and other evidence 
20101227220821.000|20101227220823.000|TR0|that they have found there at the scene.
20101227220823.000|20101227220826.000|TR0|
20101227220826.000|20101227220828.000|TR0|Just to give you some context of exactly 
20101227220828.000|20101227220830.000|TR0|how this happened.  This was an area 
20101227220830.000|20101227220833.000|TR0|(INAUDIBLE) district, the tribal areas of 
20101227220833.000|20101227220835.000|TR0|Pakistan, on the border with Afghanistan, 
20101227220835.000|20101227220838.000|TR0|this is an area where the Pakistani 
20101227220838.000|20101227220840.000|TR0|military had engaged in some really 
20101227220840.000|20101227220843.000|TR0|intense fighting with the Taliban 
20101227220843.000|20101227220845.000|TR0|militants in that area.  It displaced 
20101227220845.000|20101227220848.000|TR0|thousands of families.  Well, the families 
20101227220848.000|20101227220850.000|TR0|were starting to come back to the area.  
20101227220850.000|20101227220852.000|TR0|And that's why the World Food Program had 
20101227220852.000|20101227220855.000|TR0|set up this food distribution center.  
20101227220855.000|20101227220857.000|TR0|They were giving away about a month's 
20101227220857.000|20101227220900.000|TR0|worth of food and supplies to some of 
20101227220900.000|20101227220902.000|TR0|these families to help them get them back 
20101227220902.000|20101227220905.000|TR0|on their feet.
20101227220905.000|20101227220907.000|TR0|
20101227220907.000|20101227220910.000|TR0|The young lady was apparently in the line 
20101227220910.000|20101227220912.000|TR0|going to the security check point with 
20101227220912.000|20101227220914.000|TR0|about 300 other people waiting to get 
20101227220914.000|20101227220917.000|TR0|food.  She was dress in a burqa, the full 
20101227220917.000|20101227220919.000|TR0|length cloth, and that's when she exploded 
20101227220919.000|20101227220922.000|TR0|her explosives, killing about 46 people 
20101227220922.000|20101227220924.000|TR0|and wounding more than 100. Again, 
20101227220924.000|20101227220927.000|TR0|extremely, extremely rare for a woman to

20101227221030.000|20101227221033.000|TR0|And by that, he means, you know, we left

20101227224300.000|20101227224303.000|TR0|people you socialize with.  A study in the

20101227224305.000|20101227224307.000|TR0|brain dealing with social interaction

20101227224312.000|20101227224315.000|TR0|study wasn't able to determine any final

20101227224322.000|20101227224325.000|TR0|friends think they're smarter.
20101227224325.000|20101227224327.000|TR0|
20101227224327.000|20101227224329.000|TR0|MALVEAUX:  I don't know about all that.  
20101227224329.000|20101227224332.000|TR0|We'll see.  Thanks, Sam.
20101227224332.000|20101227224334.000|TR0|
20101227224334.000|20101227224337.000|TR0|Threats of all-out war intensify on the 
20101227224337.000|20101227224339.000|TR0|Korean Peninsula.  Ahead, the strong new 
20101227224339.000|20101227224342.000|TR0|message the South is using to prepare.
20101227224342.000|20101227224344.000|TR0|

20101227224349.000|20101227224352.000|TR0|MALVEAUX:  South Korea is ratcheting up 
20101227224352.000|20101227224354.000|TR0|national calls for solidarity amid threats

20101227224406.000|20101227224409.000|TR0|
20101227224409.000|20101227224411.000|TR0|KYUNG LAH, CNN INTERNATIONAL 
20101227224411.000|20101227224414.000|TR0|CORRESPONDENT:  This is a message from 
20101227224414.000|20101227224416.000|TR0|South Korea's government to its public 
20101227224416.000|20101227224418.000|TR0|through pictures.  This is a picture of 
20101227224418.000|20101227224421.000|TR0|the Cheonan warship that was sunk earlier 
20101227224421.000|20101227224423.000|TR0|this year, last March, by the North 
20101227224423.000|20101227224426.000|TR0|Koreans.  And this is a photo gallery 
20101227224426.000|20101227224428.000|TR0|showing what 2010 was to South Korea, a 
20101227224428.000|20101227224431.000|TR0|year where this country saw a number of 
20101227224431.000|20101227224433.000|TR0|attacks from the North that, if you look

20101227224445.000|20101227224448.000|TR0|to garner public opinion behind the 
20101227224448.000|20101227224450.000|TR0|government's mission to try to solidify 
20101227224450.000|20101227224453.000|TR0|that public opinion.  It's also matching 
20101227224453.000|20101227224455.000|TR0|some tougher words from the South Korean 
20101227224455.000|20101227224458.000|TR0|president.
20101227224458.000|20101227224500.000|TR0|

20101227224502.000|20101227224505.000|TR0|can only be prevented when provocations

20101227224507.000|20101227224510.000|TR0|president adding that, "Fear of war will

20101227224512.000|20101227224515.000|TR0|danger that the Republican of Korea faces

20101227224751.000|20101227224754.000|TR0|seemed exaggerated, but whatever it was, 
20101227224754.000|20101227224756.000|TR0|it was impressive.

20101227224803.000|20101227224806.000|TR0|the countryside, and we're here

20101227224902.000|20101227224905.000|TR0|road.  This is a very poor country.

20101227224917.000|20101227224919.000|TR0|Triomphe, supposedly bigger than the one

20101227224936.000|20101227224939.000|TR0|Pyongyang, and it really is majestic, to

20101227225413.000|20101227225415.000|TR0|
20101227225415.000|20101227225418.000|TR0|MALVEAUX:  Clearly close to Barack Obama's 
20101227225418.000|20101227225420.000|TR0|parents.
20101227225420.000|20101227225423.000|TR0|
